text: Langford Baker (29 March 1879 – 20 May 1964) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. He played for Lowestoft Town in the 1900 final of the FA Amateur Cup. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1964 deaths Category:People from Lowestoft Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Lowestoft North End F.C. players Category:Lowestoft Harriers F.C. players Category:Lowestoft Town F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Norwich City F.C. players Category:East Halton Rovers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Langford Baker
